titleInfo.title: SPA - A System for Analysis of Indoor Team Sports Using Video Tracking and Wireless Sensor Network

mods.abstract: This paper presents a sport analysis system (SPA – Sport Performance Analyzer), consisting of a high resolution video system together with a wireless sensor network for collecting position data and physiological data of sport players during training or competition. The combination of the two data streams provides a new performance analysis and visualization solution for indoor team sports.
